Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
MainFormController
public class MainFormController
extends java.lang.Object
Controls the MainForm.fxml scene.
Author:
Brian Oliver

    Returns the current product selected in the Products tableview.
    void initialize()
    Populates the partsTableView and productTableView tables and sets the event listeners to assign the class part and product variables on table row selections.
    void partsAddButtonListener()
    Switches the scene to the AddForm.fxml scene when the partsAddButton is clicked.
    void partsDeleteButtonListener()
    Deletes the currently selected part in the partsTableView from Inventory.allParts.
    void partsModifyButtonListener()
    Switches the scene to the ModForm.fxml scene when the partsModifyButton is clicked and the MainControllerForm part variable is not null.

    Opens the AddProductForm.fxml scene to create a new Product Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainFormController

      public MainFormController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Populates the partsTableView and productTableView tables and sets the event listeners to assign the class part and product variables on table row selections. Logical/Runtime Errors: I initially received thread errors when attempting to initiate the listener and it seems to have been caused by me using a comparison operator on an integer instead of string in the predicate lambda function. Since this way of implementing the listener with Platform.runLater() worked, it is implemented this way in each controller. Compatible Features on Update: The search field listener can be updated to be initiated outside of the Platform.runLater method.

    • getPart

      public static Part getPart()
      Returns the current part selected in the Parts tableview. This function is needed to pass the selected part to the ModForm.fxml scene. Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Updates: None
      Returns:
      The selected part on the Parts tableview.

    • getProduct

      public static Product getProduct()
      Returns the current product selected in the Products tableview. This function is needed to pass the selected product to the ModProductForm.fxml scene. Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Updates: None
      Returns:
      The selected product on the Products tableview.

    • setPart

      public static void setPart​(Part newPart)
      Assigns the static part variable to the part input Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: None
      Parameters:
      newPart - The part to set

    • setProduct

      public static void setProduct​(Product newProduct)
      Assigns the static product variable to the product input Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: None
      Parameters:
      newProduct - The product to set

    • exitButtonListener

      public void exitButtonListener()
      Closes the program when the exit button is clicked. Logical/Runtime Error: None Compatible Features on Update: None

    • partsAddButtonListener

      public void partsAddButtonListener() throws java.io.IOException
      Switches the scene to the AddForm.fxml scene when the partsAddButton is clicked. Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if AddForm.fxml can not be loaded.

    • productAddButtonListener

      public void productAddButtonListener() throws java.io.IOException
      Opens the AddProductForm.fxml scene to create a new Product Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the scene is unable to be loaded.

    • partsModifyButtonListener

      public void partsModifyButtonListener() throws java.io.IOException
      Switches the scene to the ModForm.fxml scene when the partsModifyButton is clicked and the MainControllerForm part variable is not null. If the part variable is null, the UI displays an error message. Logical/Runtime Error: None Compatible Feature Updates: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if ModForm.fxml can not be loaded'

    • productsModifyButtonListener

      public void productsModifyButtonListener() throws java.io.IOException
      Switches the scene to the ModForm.fxml scene when the productsModifyButton is clicked and the MainControllerForm product variable is not null. If the product variable is null, the UI displays an error message. Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the scene is unable to be loaded.

    • partsDeleteButtonListener

      public void partsDeleteButtonListener()
      Deletes the currently selected part in the partsTableView from Inventory.allParts. If the part variable is null, the UI displays an error message. Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.

    • productsDeleteButtonListener

      public void productsDeleteButtonListener()
      Deletes the currently selected product in the partsTableView from Inventory.allProducts. If the product variable is null, the UI displays an error message. Logical/Runtime Errors: None Compatible Features on Update: The method name can be updated in future iterations to reflect the standard set[button name]Button naming standard.
